title: PetSafe Sport Leash, Durable Nylon Leash with Unique Padded Hand Wrap Handle to Help Keep Hands Free for Running or Walking, for Dogs up to 75 lb.
features: INNOVATIVE DESIGN: The PetSafe Sport Leash features a unique hand wrap to help you keep a firm grasp; converts to a padded handle with one quick snap
ADJUSTABLE LENGTH: Use the slide adjuster to find the right fit for you and your cat or dog; leash adjusts from 3 ft. to 4.5 ft. in length

REDUCES LEASH TENSION: A built-in bungee lowers leash tension and helps reduce jolts from sudden pulls for you and your pet; the Sport Leash is not recommended for dogs over 75 lb. or for leash pullers
SEE AND BE SEEN: The PetSafe Sport Leash is available in 3 attractive colors and has reflective nylon stitching for added safety
description: Keep a firm grasp on your busy life with the PetSafe Sport Leash! The innovative design of the Sport Leash features a unique hand wrap which gives you control of your dog or cat while keeping both hands free to use. The soft, padded hand wrap has a thumb cuff and adjusts to any size hand without over-tightening. The Sport Leash is perfect for walking, jogging and pushing strollers or carts. A built-in bungee lowers leash tension which helps reduce the force of sudden pulls or jolts. When you need a standard leash, use the quick snap button to convert the hand wrap into a handle. The PetSafe Sport Leash is the perfect options for life on the move.
